wikipedia_page.main: This page is about the historical figure. For the fictionalized version, see Derfel Cadarn (Warlord Chronicles). For other uses, see Derfel (disambiguation).Derfel, known as Derfel Gadarn ([c]adarn: "mighty, valiant, strong"), was a 6th-century Celtic Christian monk regarded as a saint. Local legend holds that he was a warrior of King Arthur.
